sentences.en: A full-scale debate is under way on what ails the industry.
sentences.cn: 关于工业为何陷入困境正在展开一场全面的讨论。

sentences.en: Don’t talk with your mouth full.
sentences.cn: 嘴里塞满东西时不要说话。

sentences.en: enjoy your free trip to Europe to the full.
sentences.cn: 充分享受你的免费欧洲之旅。

sentences.en: He drove his car through the gates at full pelt.
sentences.cn: 他驾车急速通过大门。

sentences.en: he had the heater full on.
sentences.cn: 他把加热器的功率开到最大。

sentences.en: he held his foot to the floor until the car raced full out.
sentences.cn: 他的一脚踩足油门，直至汽车全速行进。

sentences.en: He knew full well he'd be ashamed of himself later.
sentences.cn: 他很清楚地知道自己过后会无地自容。

sentences.en: He pushed everyone full speed ahead until production hit a bottleneck.
sentences.cn: 他催促所有人拼命干活，直到生产遭遇瓶颈。

sentences.en: His statement on the handling of prisoners is worth quoting in full.
sentences.cn: 他关于如何处置囚犯的那番话应该完整地引用。

sentences.en: I have had more than my full share of adventures.
sentences.cn: 我已经有了太多丰富多彩的历险。

sentences.en: I shall expect your life story in full.
sentences.cn: 我期待着看到你生平故事的全文。

sentences.en: In June 1942, the British 8th Army was in full retreat.
sentences.cn: 1942年6月,英国第八军全面撤退.

sentences.en: Jem was full of beans after a long sleep.
sentences.cn: 杰姆好好睡了一觉之后又变得精力充沛了。

sentences.en: She looked him full in the face as she spoke.
sentences.cn: 她说话的时候直盯着他的脸。

sentences.en: The bath was full to the brim (= completely full ) with hot water.
sentences.cn: 浴缸里满满一缸热水。

sentences.en: The class is full, but you can register for next term.
sentences.cn: 这个班已经满了，不过你可以注册下学期的。

sentences.en: The debt must be paid in full .
sentences.cn: 欠款必须全部偿清。

sentences.en: The Health Centre offers a full range of services.
sentences.cn: 医疗中心提供全套服务。

sentences.en: The house was large and full of art treasures.
sentences.cn: 房子很大，里面摆满了艺术珍品。

sentences.en: The president was in full agreement with the proposal.
sentences.cn: 总统完全赞同该提议。

sentences.en: the recession has hit us full on.
sentences.cn: 经济衰退已经直接影响到我们。

sentences.en: The town itself was full of life and character.
sentences.cn: 这个城市本身充满活力，个性十足。

sentences.en: The train was completely full.
sentences.cn: 火车坐得满满的。

sentences.en: They pay full rates. Mind you, they can afford it.
sentences.cn: 他们付全价，请注意，他们是付得起的。

sentences.en: We are selling the full range of World Cup merchandising.
sentences.cn: 我们出售世界杯的所有纪念商品。

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentences.en: With a nice dark colour, the wine is medium to full bodied.
sentences.cn: 这种葡萄酒色泽深暗悦目，是中等浓郁至浓香型的。

phrases.tran_cn: 自鸣得意的；自以为是的
产生直接（或重大）影响地
全音域，全频；全距；全馏程
全尺寸；原大的；完全的；全刻度的；满量程
全方位服务；（英）做礼拜时全部颂歌的乐谱
达到活动的高潮；全力进行中
完整无缺地（的）；不加删节地（的）

trans.tran_cn: 满的，有大量…的，最大量的，充满…的，饱的，完全的，详尽的，浓郁的，丰满的
trans.tran_en: containing as much or as many things or people as possible, so there is no space left
